price: 18. Yalli usuk isi naqoosah amol dirkiseh yaniih küllim kaah taqunxee, usuk naggaaraay adda yaaxigi kinni.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلۡقَاهِرُ فَوۡقَ عِبَادِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa al-qāhiru fawqa ʿibādihi wahuwa al-ḥakīmu al-khabīru
